Encouragement to charity a sermon preached at the Charter-House Chapel Dec. 12, 1678, at an anniversary meeting in commemoration of the founder / by William Durham. Durham, William, d. 1686.
27 p.
Printed for Matthew Gilliflower, London : 1679.
Entry for Wing D2830 cancelled in Wing 2nd ed. Reproduction of originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Folger Shakespeare Library.
